page.title: 03MACHINES AND TOOLS WE USE
page.content: We have sewing machines to sew with and to mend clothes. We have lawn mowers, vacuum cleaners, washing machines and tumble driers. Some people have dish washers and coffee makers. We have tools like hammers, chisels and screw-drivers for making and mending things made of wood or metal and for joining things together or for fixing articles like pictures and placques on our walls. We use spades, forks, hoes and rakes to do our gardening. Some tools are driven by electricity. We have power saws, hedge cutters, lawn mowers and drills. Construction firms use large machines like bull-dozers, cement mixers and cranes. Written by Lucy Thomas
